factoryName.metadata: データ ファクトリ名

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> alter1
alter1 sink(input(
		order_id as long,
		shop_cd as string,
		total as long,
		rgdt as timestamp,
		updt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['order_id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		order_id = Column_1,
		shop_cd = Column_2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

properties.description: Scan the file path on your source storage store and get the container list.

activities.name: ForEachContainer
activities.description: Get the container list from Metadata activity and then iterates each of them to Copy activity.

activities.name: CopyOneContainer
activities.description: Copy each container from source storage store to destination store.

properties.description: バッチ実行結果を参照し自JOBが当日正常終了していなければ処理続行

activities.name: GetJobStatusGM
activities.description: 本日のバッチ実行結果を参照

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt
  FROM batch_exec_rslt_info beri
 WHERE exec_dt = dbo.get_current_exec_dt()
   AND odbms_arriv_gm_in_rslt_cd = '1'

activities.name: CheckJobStatusGM
activities.description: 本日のバッチ実行結果をチェック

vc_log_text.value: 実施済であるため、パイプライン処理を起動しません。

properties.description: バッチ実行結果を参照し先行JOBが当日正常終了していれば処理続行

activities.name: GetJobStatus
activities.description: 本日のバッチ実行結果を参照

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt
  FROM batch_exec_rslt_info beri
 WHERE exec_dt = dbo.get_current_exec_dt()
   AND odbms_stock_md_in_rslt_cd = '1'
   AND odbms_stock_gr_in_rslt_cd = '1'
   AND odbms_stock_gm_in_rslt_cd = '1'
   AND odbms_arriv_md_in_rslt_cd = '1'
   AND odbms_arriv_gr_in_rslt_cd = '1'
   AND odbms_arriv_gm_in_rslt_cd = '1'
   AND odbms_brakeset_in_rslt_cd = '1'

activities.name: CheckJobStatus
activities.description: 本日のバッチ実行結果をチェック

vc_log_text.value: 他のバッチ処理がまだ完了していません。
